frontmatter.title: Schedule flexibility is a luxury
frontmatter.description: Don't let it become a burden. Recognize the opportunities presented with schedule flexibility, and realize the value of time.

frontmatter.title: Create own rules to safely proceed
frontmatter.description: Keep in mind what can be controlled. Create own rules as needed.

frontmatter.title: Respect the agency of individuals
frontmatter.description: Allow others to live with agency.
